meanings.definition: The hide or skin of a cow.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy's boots were made of cowhide.
meanings.sent2: The farmer sold cowhide to the leather factory.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the cowhide rug was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The artist used cowhide as a canvas for their painting.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cowhide filled the room as the shoemaker worked.

meanings.definition: To beat or whip with a cowhide.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy threatened to cowhide the unruly cattle.
meanings.sent2: The cruel taskmaster would cowhide the workers for any mistake.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child joked that they would cowhide their toys if they misbehaved.
meanings.sent4: The coach warned the players that he would cowhide them if they didn't improve their performance.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cowhide striking the wooden table echoed through the barn.
